title: Data simulation and parameters recovery with brms
text: Formulas used data simulation lavaan::simulateData(): Histograms simulated dataset:
code: #> std ~ 0.05 * SES + 0.05 * threat+ 0.05 * deprivation+ 0.01 * stochasticity + 0.1 * volatility #> internalizing ~ 0.05 * std + 0.1 * SES+ 0.015 * threat + -0.02 * deprivation+ -0.03 * stochasticity + 0.06 * volatility #> externalizing ~ 0.3 * std + 0.1 * SES+ 0.11 * threat + 0.04 * deprivation+ -0.01 * stochasticity + 0.04 * volatility

what: Reproducible Analytical Pipeline Demonstration For OSF Pre-registration
title: Reproducible Analytical Pipeline Demonstration For OSF Pre-registration
text: repository companion OSF pre-registration. organized R package can installed : provides R code instructions run demonstration pipeline () simulates fake datasets based equations described three main models pre-registration, (ii) attempts recover structural parameters used simulation estimating path models brms. Tables plots obtained running demonstration pipeline can found . ensure analysis pipeline reproducible, detail next sections : () set computing environment required dependencies, (ii) run demonstration pipeline.

title: Reproducible Analytical Pipeline Demonstration For OSF Pre-registration
text: Two strategies proposed get required dependencies running new machine. first strategy uses container image generate demand virtualized computing environments isolated rest host machine tools necessary run pipeline pre-installed. second strategy uses {renv} create project local library appropriate versions R dependencies. second strategy less reproducible since R installation system dependencies need managed user. instance, installation Stan probabilistic programming language used brms fit path models using bayesian estimation procedures recorded renv need performed separate step. Nevertheless, advantage require installation use specialized software launching managing containers, might familiar certain R users.

title: Reproducible Analytical Pipeline Demonstration For OSF Pre-registration
text: First, need machine Podman installed (Docker might also work properly tested). Instructions installation Podman various platforms can found official documentation. terminal, can execute following podman command pull container image local machine: image downloaded, launch container: Open terminal project directory Copy/paste following command terminal: create container based container image just pulled automatically start RStudio server session within container. Open web browser type localhost:8787 address bar. Now connected RStudio session running container. access files project directory packages used demonstration pipeline. stop container press Ctrl-c terminal close RStudio session type exit leave destroy running container.

title: Reproducible Analytical Pipeline Demonstration For OSF Pre-registration
text: First, need copy renv.lock located root github repository project folder. file used renv record exact versions R dependencies need present execute code project. already renv installed machine, run install.packages("renv"). , restore computing environment run renv::init() select Restore project lockfile option. install necessary R packages new renv/ folder root project. Now, next time open RStudio R console root project directory renv environment automatically loaded packages available.

title: Reproducible Analytical Pipeline Demonstration For OSF Pre-registration
text: analysis pipeline managed using R package targets. execute pipeline machine, first need run osfHYoungFFCWS::get_targets_files() R environnement package installed. copy two files root working directory: _targets.R Data-simulation--parameter-recovery--brms.Rmd. former defines steps pipeline later R Markdown file used generate HTML report tables plots. , simply execute targets::tar_make() run pipeline. command create root working directory _targets/ folder used internally targets store results computations. Data-simulation--parameter-recovery--brms.html also generated automatically R Markdown file. report available pkgdown article. See Getting started well Reference sections information functions used pipeline ways modify default values simulation parameters models’ priors. learn managing R pipelines targets, can refer package’s User Guide.
